feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.07.152
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • a54ea505c9614d1722c4c29fae9e38b1018be3e4 bugfix: Allow . in enxtended variable paths

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.07.152

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.07.152

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.08.14
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 1cf971c0923dbfa5c4d07fe1ef7a37ce780fae3c feature: Better format for server dashboard
  • fab0264d9b133ba8c6269d07d882ef26e9d3539f feature: Cleanup execution dialog, and log display status. (#378)
  • 7a7a07d9adcc65539fe3b55b15016dcc7d25dae9 feature: Minor change to action timeout message to be more consistent with other logs (#380)
  • 8cd5b9fb46c0842d0bec5926c05bb55a0fd4cfaf feature: Trace log message on ExecRequest for debugging (#375)
  • 5b5fca083753a11d781c1fb63ff15df4ad2f6ad7 feature: enableCustomJs toggle to allow loading ./custom-webui/custom.js (#379) https://docs.olivetin.app/customize-webui.html#custom-js
  • 9ca19408342b7db23b1010d4173fa4786b6766e3 feature: change all navigation to path based (#384)
  • b50824a70502b54b164534c41869f02ad009091a feature: support basic dev tasks in Windows (#364)
  • 37160a91f32c26c7c6a7b624d29492b408378c54 feature: take full page and display footer at bottom pf window (#383)

Bug fixes

  • 1fe0e49adbc76717382e4c033220016daf806eff bugfix: #337 - Entity overwriting (#382)
  • 40158eda71ef9716e7f3bed6a61e05999e0174c2 bugfix: Race condition on executor logs (#385)
  • d9e921950f71e9995abafcf9ed9b36af8b1af882 bugfix: fix type of the prometheus metric act req as count (#370)
  • 8d839ee6ce3cc65642f3b58e071f4a409e1174b8 bugfix: fsnotify event logs moved to DEBUG level, because info was spammy
  • ffcd19e748752fce719aa5deb2d4a4fde637ae4c bugfix: use cross-platform module filepath to set usedConfigDir (#369)

Others

  • 17dd1b4158f90b53f696603ea47bae4ab966e0a8 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • d0eb132b95b6015cf09be17c640cb1dcc9cbeb10 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • e183910b88b11e4f1153757b2504173ba3e9f361 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • 6958445f83ef94447e3f7d7dff306b1ef5693eea Use windows compatible cmds and wait more time (#374)
  • c9095b4d6751d4fb8d49b459ae7259ac4065c6c6 build(deps): bump axios from 1.6.8 to 1.7.4 in /integration-tests (#387)
  • e5f6d8ff50c24ca04e1ccce72b8a5f080e021e98 build(deps): bump github.com/docker/docker (#372)
  • bbbbfceeb3a9766d9e12c722fe378a04e8416efc build(deps): bump github.com/docker/docker (#386)
  • 90efbf3159b0772638b13c6e1e355bcf43726f9c fmt: #368
  • 274d036f7473fcdfba6313133b49f8532e33d7fd fmt: Cleanup terminal code (#381)
  • 49f745be689ebf63639530ebf26daad62790a563 fmt: Set for setdir (#367)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.08.14

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.08.14

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • Navigation change - subpath support dropped. https://docs.olivetin.app/upgrade-notes.html#_navigation_change_subpaths_no_longer_supported

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
